summary: User timeline_11 describes dealing with social anxiety and isolation, with increasing engagement in treatment.

posts.text: The new medication makes me feel numb. I'm broken beyond repair I don't feel like myself anymore. I pushed everyone away Scheduled an appointment to discuss adjusting the dosage. wrote in my journal Keeping a mood journal to track changes. I deserve to get better
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels impossible. I'm a burden to everyone I'm worthless. I'm failing at everything Did one small thing today - made my bed. asked for support Trying to celebrate tiny victories. I'm working on self-compassion
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Work is overwhelming me. I'm disgusting I'm on the verge of a breakdown. I'm losing my mind Talked to my manager about reducing my workload. called the crisis hotline Taking a mental health day tomorrow. I deserve to get better
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The urges to self-harm are strong. I'm tired of existing I'm completely numb Using the distraction techniques I learned. wrote in my journal Reached out to my crisis support instead. Small steps are still progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Had a really bad day after weeks of progress. I hate myself so much I hurt myself again Using my coping skills instead of old habits. started going to therapy This setback doesn't erase my progress. I'm not giving up
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Can't handle the pressure anymore. Life is meaningless I'm completely numb Started setting better boundaries at work. did some self-care activities Learned to say no to extra projects. I acknowledge my progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The depression is getting worse. I'm worthless and pathetic I isolated myself from all my friends I know I need help so I started going to therapy My therapist suggested I'm working on self-compassion
maladaptive_evidence: I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Can't even do basic tasks today. I'm broken beyond repair I hurt myself again Managed to shower and eat breakfast. wrote in my journal Small steps are still steps forward. I'm working on self-compassion
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I've been struggling with depression for weeks now. Nothing will ever get better I stopped taking my medication But yesterday I finally used my DBT skills and scheduled an appointment. I'm working on self-compassion
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feeling hopeful for the first time in months. took my medication as prescribed Things can get better Had a bad moment yesterday. I'm a burden to everyone But I worked through it using my tools. Things can get better
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: Everything feels impossible. I can't do anything right I'm worthless. I don't care about anything anymore Did one small thing today - made my bed. went for a walk to clear my head Trying to celebrate tiny victories. I deserve to get better
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
maladaptive_evidence: I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I relapsed again last night. I'm broken beyond repair I hate myself for it. I stopped taking my medication Called my therapist this morning practiced my coping strategies and we talked through it. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I've been isolating myself from everyone. I'm worthless and pathetic I don't care about anything anymore But today I reached out to an old friend went for a walk to clear my head and we made plans to meet up. I deserve to get better
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
maladaptive_evidence: I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Another day of feeling terrible. Nothing will ever get better I isolated myself from all my friends Went outside for 10 minutes. asked for support Called a friend. Taking it one day at a time
adaptive_evidence: Taking it one day at a time
maladaptive_evidence: I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Work is overwhelming me. Nothing will ever get better I'm on the verge of a breakdown. I've been having suicidal thoughts Talked to my manager about reducing my workload. did some self-care activities Taking a mental health day tomorrow. Things can get better
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping
